img_summary: The image shows a scene from a video game where a character in detailed armor and a green cape stands inside a wooden structure. The room contains a wooden chair on the left and a table with two lit candles on the right. A golden object on the table is highlighted with a red dotted circle, indicating it is an interactable or important item. The doorway leads to an outdoor area with trees, rocks, and a stone wall visible. The game's user interface displays health and stamina bars, along with various ability icons.
